metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Pour batter into small dishes and steam until set. o Sauté chopped shrimp and green onions until cooked. o Top steamed cakes with shrimp, green onions, and fried shallots.

o Place a spoonful of filling on each circle and fold to seal. o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt in a food processor. o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden.

 Instructions: o Form risotto into balls and stuff with a cube of mozzarella. o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. o Mix beans, onion, molasses, brown sugar, ketchup, mustard, salt, and pepper in a baking dish.

o Add water and knead until smooth. o Brush with melted butter and fold into squares. o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth.

o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. o Sauté sliced beef, diced onion, julienned carrot, and bell pepper in sesame oil until cooked. o Mix noodles with soy sauce, sugar, and sesame seeds.
